<small>Also see: **<big>[[H2498|חָלַף]]</big>**</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלַף‎</span> **verb** ==draw out, off== (Late Hebrew ***id., loosen, draw*** (nail, sword; [[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]]); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šalâpu***</u></abbr>, ***pluck out***, ***draw*** sword; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְֵַף‎</span> ***draw*** sword, ***draw off*** shoe, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***draw*** sword, in Lexicons ***remove*** corselet; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***pass, pass away***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strip, plunder***, etc.); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Judg.3.22|Judg 3:22]] +; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁלֹף‎</span> [[Ruth.4.8|Ruth 4:8]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלֹף‎</span> [[Judg.9.54|Judg 9:54]] +; ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁלֵף‎</span> [[Judg.8.10|Judg 8:10]] +, etc.; ***passive*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁלוּפָה‎</span> [[Num.22.23|Num 22:23]] +; — 

**1.** ***draw out*** sword from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) wound [[Judg.3.22|Judg 3:22]], compare [[Job.20.25|Job 20:25]] usually sword from sheath [[Judg.8.20|Judg 8:20]]; [[Judg.9.54|Judg 9:54]]; [[1Sam.31.4|1Sam 31:4]] = [[1Chr.10.4|1Chr 10:4]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתַּעְרָהּ‎</span> [[1Sam.17.51|1Sam 17:51]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְחַרְבּוֺ שָׁלוּפָה בְּיָדוֺ‎</span> [[Num.22.23|Num 22:23]]; [[Num.22.31|Num 22:31]]; [[Josh.5.13|Josh 5:13]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Chr.21.16|1Chr 21:16]] elsewhere <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ שֹׁלֵף ח‎</span> collective [[Judg.8.10|Judg 8:10]]; [[Judg.20.2|Judg 20:2]]; [[Judg.20.15|Judg 20:15]]; [[Judg.20.17|Judg 20:17]]; [[Judg.20.46|Judg 20:46]]; [[2Sam.24.9|2Sam 24:9]]; [[2Kgs.3.26|2Kgs 3:26]]; [[1Chr.21.5|1Chr 21:5]] (twice in verse), compare [[Judg.20.35|Judg 20:35]] and (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלֹפֵי ח‎</span>) v[[Judg.20.25|Judg 20:25]]. 

**2.** ***draw off*** sandal [[Ruth.4.7|Ruth 4:7]]; [[Ruth.4.8|Ruth 4:8]] (compare I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חלץ‎</span> **1**; also [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 269</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[Deut.25.9|Deut 25:9]]</sup> Bewer<sup>SK lxxvi (1903), 332</sup>). 

**3.** ***shoot up*** (?), i.e. ***draw out*** blade, of grass on roof [[Ps.129.6|Ps 129:6]] (compare [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others); [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] is ***unsheathed*** (verb with subject indefinite = passive), with same meaning; [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלֵם‎</span> (with \|\| in Syriac); see Ortenberg<sup>Textkrit1 K d. Ps. (1861), 30</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁחָלָף‎</span>, [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Hpt</sup> [[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲלֹף‎</span> (as [[Ps.90.5|Ps 90:5]]; [[Ps.90.6|Ps 90:6]], see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> **2**).
